articles.author: Brooke DiPalma
articles.title: Walmart stock pops after earnings beat, retailer surpasses $500 billion in market cap - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: The retail giant posted strong numbers as Americans look to stretch their dollars.
articles.content:
Walmart (WMT) wowed Wall Street yet again, causing the stock to jump about 6% in early trading Thursday.
For its fiscal 2025 Q1, America's biggest retailer posted revenue of $161.51 billion, higher … [+4874 chars]

articles.title: Under Armour is laying off workers as retailer says North America sales will plunge this year - CNBC
articles.description: Sales in Under Armour's largest market in North America are falling as inflation-weary consumers pull back on new clothes and shoes.
articles.content: Under Armour announced a broad restructuring plan on Thursday as it said sales in its largest market, North America, plunged 10% and predicted the trend will get worse throughout its current fiscal y… [+3802 chars]

articles.title: Census Bureau estimates: Detroit population rises after decades of decline, South dominates growth - The Associated Press
articles.description: U.S. Census Bureau estimates show America's Northeast and Midwest cities are rebounding slightly from years of population drops, highlighted by modest growth in Detroit after decades of declines. Government figures released Thursday show Detroit saw its popul…
articles.content: DETROIT (AP) Americas Northeast and Midwest cities are rebounding slightly from years of population drops especially Detroit, which grew for the first time in decades though the South still dominates… [+4733 chars]
